**Contract Title**
-------------------

K8D10-240617 Freeze Dryer

**procurement regards**
------------------------

This procurement regards the provision of a Freeze Dryer without a heat option for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC).

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The Contractor shall supply a Freeze Dryer capable of processing sediment samples in bulk. The unit must be able to hold large glass or plastic containers (up to 500ml) used during field collection within the freeze dryer chambers, and allow for significant enough volume to limit the time and effort required for each drying cycle.

**Exclusivity**
--------------

This procurement is subject to exclusive rights.

------
